questions.title: What are Proof-of-Membership SoulBound Tokens?
questions.text: Proof-of-Membership SoulBound Tokens are like digital membership cards that authenticate and verify membership within a community or organization, ensuring secure and personalized access.

questions.title: How much does it cost to use PoM?
questions.text: Main PoM features such as community’s and membership’s registrations as well as their management are available for free as public goods! As the PoM application is blockchain-based, users only need to pay small transaction costs when interacting with the blockchain. For example, when registering a community or issuing their personalized membership SoulBound Token. Communities verification by admins is a paid feature. Price depends on the current size of the community, and to be done in ETH or tokens.

questions.title: On which blockchain does PoM operate, and how can I acquire the tokens required for transaction fees?
questions.text: For now, PoM is built based on Gnosis Chain. Advantages of Gnosis Chain for end users include being an Ethereum sidechain with quick and cheap transactions. Additionally, users can access a Faucet and obtain 'free' xDAI tokens. [Provide a link!]

questions.title: I have more questions, how can I contact you?
How do I get my membership in a specific community?
There is no community yet, where I want to get membership at. What should I do?
How can I submit a review for a community?
What kind of reviews can I submit for a community?
questions.text: Write about positive and critical reviews, containing info about the potential risk factors!

questions.title: Why should we create our community at PoM?
Can I change memberships’ design for my community?
What are the benefits of verified communities?
questions.text: Navigating the web3 space can sometimes be risky. Communities with verified info, admin, and members can help in building trust by reducing misinformation and creating a better space for learning and collaboration. Also, verified communities can 'endorse/censure' other communities, as well as can decide on the future PoM features.

questions.title: How do I get my community verified?
questions.text: Reach out to us through a dedicated Discord channel for the exact steps! But we promise, we’ll keep it quick and simple.
